sen.j: 寄木細工（よせぎざいく）は、箱根町や海外の土産物屋でよく見られる伝統工芸品である。
sen.e: Yosegi zaiku is a traditional craft often seen at souvenir stores in the town of Hakone as well as in countries overseas.
Yosegi zaiku is a traditional craft often seen at souvenir shops in the town of Hakone as well as in countries overseas.
sen.cmt: stores を shops に修正しました。
sen.e: Yosegi zaiku is a traditional craft often seen at souvenir shops in the town of Hakone as well as in countries overseas.

sen.j: 200年程の歴史を持つ。
sen.e: It has a history of about 200 years.
It has a history of about 200 years.
It has a history of about 200 years.

sen.j: 縞（シマ）、市松、紗綾型（サヤガタ）、麻の葉、マス、矢羽根、青海波（セイカイハ）など日本の伝統文様を木で寄せた技法である。
sen.e: It is a technique in which traditional Japanese patterns, such as shima (stripes), ichimatsu (checks), sayagata (gossamar-figured pattern), asanoha (stylized hemp leaf pattern), masu (square checks), yabane (fletched arrow pattern) and seikaiha (pattern of waves in blue ocean), are created by yosegi (wooden mosaic) work.

It is a technique in which traditional Japanese patterns, such as shima (stripes), ichimatsu (checks), sayagata (gossamer-figured pattern), asanoha (stylized hemp leaf pattern), masu (square checks), yabane (fletched arrow pattern) and seikaiha (pattern of waves in blue ocean), are created by yosegi (wooden mosaic) work.
sen.cmt: gossamar を gossamer に修正しました。
sen.e: It is a technique in which traditional Japanese patterns, such as shima (stripes), ichimatsu (checks), sayagata (gossamer-figured pattern), asanoha (stylized hemp leaf pattern), masu (square checks), yabane (fletched arrow pattern) and seikaiha (pattern of waves in blue ocean), are created by yosegi (wooden mosaic) work.

sen.j: 毎年正月に開催される東京箱根間往復大学駅伝競走では、往路優勝チームに寄木細工で作られたトロフィーが授与されることで知られている。
sen.e: The Tokyo-Hakone collegiate ekiden race, held annually at New Year, is known for presenting a trophy made of yosegi zaiku to the winning team of the first leg of the race.
The Tokyo-Hakone collegiate ekiden race, held annually in Japanese New Year, is known for presenting a trophy made of yosegi zaiku to the winning team of the first leg of the race.
sen.cmt: at New Year を in Japanese New Year に修正しました。
sen.e: The Tokyo-Hakone collegiate ekiden race, held annually in Japanese New Year, is known for presenting a trophy made of yosegi zaiku to the winning team of the first leg of the race.

sen.j: 材料は日本各地にある、ホオ、ニガキ、サクラ、ミズキ、タモなどの雑木、倒木して土に埋まり数百年かかって掘り出された桂などの神代（ジンダイ）などを使用する。
sen.e: The materials used are brush wood pieces such as Japanese bigleaf magnolia, bitterwood, cherry, cornel and tamo (Fraxinus mandshurica or Fraxinus sieboldiana, a type of ash) that are found throughout Japan, as well as jindai (something that was buried underground or submerged in water for many years) such as katsura (Japanese Judas tree) that fell, became buried in soil and then dug out few hundred years later.

The materials used are brush wood pieces such as Japanese bigleaf magnolia, bitterwood, cherry, cornel and tamo (Fraxinus mandshurica or Fraxinus sieboldiana, a type of ash) that are found throughout Japan, as well as jindai (something that was buried underground or submerged in water for many years) such as katsura (Japanese Judas tree) that fell, buried in soil and then dug out several hundred years later.
sen.cmt: became buried の became を削除しました。few を several に修正しました。
sen.e: The materials used are brush wood pieces such as Japanese bigleaf magnolia, bitterwood, cherry, cornel and tamo (Fraxinus mandshurica or Fraxinus sieboldiana, a type of ash) that are found throughout Japan, as well as jindai (something that was buried underground or submerged in water for many years) such as katsura (Japanese Judas tree) that fell, buried in soil and then dug out several hundred years later.

sen.j: 箱根山などにある樹木では植林されているのであまり適していない。
sen.e: Trees that are found at Mt. Hakone are planted trees, and therefore they are not very suitable.
Since the trees on Mt. Hakone are planted ones, they are not very suitable.
Since the trees on Mt. Hakone are planted ones, they are not very suitable.

sen.j: 材料選びは赤身が弱いものを小寄木（こよせぎ）、強いものを無垢にする。
sen.e: For material selection, those with less red color are used for koyosegi (small yosegi), and the strongly red-colored ones are used for muku (solid color).
For material selection, those with less red color are used for koyosegi (small yosegi), and the strongly red-colored ones are used for muku (solid color).
For material selection, those with less red color are used for koyosegi (small yosegi), and the strongly red-colored ones are used for muku (solid color).

sen.j: 横挽きして手押し鉋で修正し、縦挽きして尺貫法で1分～1分5厘、約3ミリ～4ミリと厚さを決める。
sen.e: The wood pieces are cut across the grain, adjusted with a hand plane, then cut along the grain until they are 3 to 4 mm in thickness.
The wood pieces are cut across the grain, adjusted with a hand plane, then cut along the grain until they are 3 to 4 mm in thickness.
The wood pieces are cut across the grain, adjusted with a hand plane, then cut along the grain until they are 3 to 4 mm in thickness.

sen.j: ねじれ、そりの強い材料は使えない。
sen.e: Strongly warped or curved materials cannot be used.
Strongly warped or curved materials cannot be used.
Strongly warped or curved materials cannot be used.

sen.j: 自動鉋盤で2.5～3.65ミリというように木取りの仕上がりの寸法を決める。
sen.e: The wood pieces are thinned to a finished thickness of 2.5 to 3.65 mm with a power plane.
The wood pieces are thinned to a finished thickness of 2.5 to 3.65 mm with a power plane.
The wood pieces are thinned to a finished thickness of 2.5 to 3.65 mm with a power plane.

sen.j: まず、一筆書きできる柄を選ぶ。
sen.e: First, a unicursal pattern is selected.
First, a unicursal pattern is selected.
First, a unicursal pattern is selected.

sen.j: 鋸はキリ穴から始まってキリ穴で終わるようにしなければならない。
sen.e: The saw has to start from a pilot hole and end with the pilot hole.
sen.cmt: 前文が traversable の場合は from a pilot hole to another pilot hole.
sen.e: The saw has to start from a pilot hole and end with the pilot hole.
The saw has to start from a pilot hole and end with the pilot hole.

sen.j: 市販されている木の文字などは糸鋸盤で挽かれたものである。
sen.e: Commercially sold wooden letters are cut with a jig saw.
Commercially sold wooden letters are cut with a jig saw.
Commercially sold wooden letters are cut with a jig saw.

sen.j: 定盤を刃の厚み分傾斜させることで曲がりの少ない丸は嵌め込まれる。
sen.e: Circular pieces with less curvature are inlaid by tilting the surface plate by the thickness of the blade.
Circular pieces with less curvature are inlaid by tilting the surface plate by the thickness of the blade.
Circular pieces with less curvature are inlaid by tilting the surface plate by the thickness of the blade.

sen.j: これを応用したものが木象嵌（もくぞうがん）である。
sen.e: This method is applied to create mokuzogan work.
This method is applied to create mokuzogan work.
This method is applied to create mokuzogan work.

sen.j: ゼンマイの板をタガネで割りこれで鋸を作る。
sen.e: Spring plates are split with a chisel to make a saw.
sen.cmt: ゼンマイの板 定訳不明 原文意味不明
sen.e: Spring plates are split with a chisel to make a saw.
Spring plates are split with a chisel to make a saw.

sen.j: さらに特別なヤスリで一本一本刃をつくる。
sen.e: Furthermore, each blade is made with a special file.
Furthermore, each blade is made with a special file.
Furthermore, each blade is made with a special file.

sen.j: 最後に背を落とせば糸に近い繊細な刃ができる。
sen.e: Finally, the backside is cut off to make a fine blade that is almost like a thread,
Finally, the backside is cut off to make a fine blade that is almost like a thread,
Finally, the backside is cut off to make a fine blade that is almost like a thread,

sen.j: はめる板を地板のはめ込みたい部分に模り上で接着させて定盤を傾斜させて本挽きすると、はめ込まれる板がピッタリ地板に入る。
sen.e: The piece to be inlaid is bonded onto the pattern on the base piece, and when the surface plate is tilted and ground, the inlay piece fits precisely in to the base piece.
The piece to be inlaid is bonded onto the pattern on the base piece, and when the surface plate is tilted and ground, the inlay piece fits precisely into the base piece.
sen.cmt: in to を into に修正しました。
sen.e: The piece to be inlaid is bonded onto the pattern on the base piece, and when the surface plate is tilted and ground, the inlay piece fits precisely into the base piece.

sen.j: 木クズを落として電熱器で煮たニカワをブラシを使って接着させる。
sen.e: The wood shavings are shaken off and the inlaid piece is glued together using a brush and hide glue that has been heated electrically.
The wood shavings are shaken off and the inlaid piece is glued together using a brush and hide glue that has been heated electrically.
The wood shavings are shaken off and the inlaid piece is glued together using a brush and hide glue that has been heated electrically.

sen.j: この工程を繰り返して、富士山、山水、納屋とはめこまれる。
sen.e: This process is repeated to inlay the pieces for Mt. Fuji, sansui (landscapes will hills and rivers) and naya (barn).
This process is repeated to inlay the pieces for Mt. Fuji, sansui (landscapes will hills and rivers) and naya (barn).
This process is repeated to inlay the pieces for Mt. Fuji, sansui (landscapes will hills and rivers) and naya (barn).

sen.j: 寄せ木を施した木材から木製品に加工する技法をムク作りという。
sen.e: The technique of processing the wooden mosaic pieces to a finished woodwork product is called muku zukuri (making muku).
sen.cmt: ムク作り 定訳不明
sen.e: The technique of processing the wooden mosaic pieces to a finished woodwork product is called "muku zukuri" (making muku).
sen.cmt: muku zukuri にダブルコーテーションを追記しました。
sen.e: The technique of processing the wooden mosaic pieces to a finished woodwork product is called "muku zukuri" (making muku).

sen.j: 無垢（むく）材は広い木端面があればいろいろな木材で接合は可能である。
sen.e: Muku pieces can be bonded with various wooden materials if the cross-sectional area is large.
Muku pieces can be bonded with various wooden materials if the cross-sectional area is large.
Muku pieces can be bonded with various wooden materials if the cross-sectional area is large.

sen.j: 大きな縞のブロックを木工のろくろ、旋盤などを使い立体的な美しい曲面に仕上げ、丸盆、ぐいのみ、なつめなどができる。
sen.e: Large striped blocks can be made into round trays, guinomi (large sake cups) or natsume (containers for storing green tea leaves or powdered green tea) using a woodworking turner or a lathe to create a beautiful, three-dimensional curved surface.

Large striped blocks can be made into round trays, guinomi (large sake cups) or natsume (containers for storing green tea leaves or powdered green tea) using a woodworking turner or a lathe to create a beautiful, three-dimensional curved surface.

Large striped blocks can be made into round trays, guinomi (large sake cups) or natsume (containers for storing green tea leaves or powdered green tea) using a woodworking turner or a lathe to create a beautiful, three-dimensional curved surface.

sen.j: 表面は寄木にして材料を積層にしてフロアーなどの床材にも応用できる。
sen.e: Materials that are layered with yosegi woodwork at the surface can also be used for floor wood for wooden floor.
Materials that are layered with yosegi woodwork at the surface can also be applied to the floor wood of wooden floor.
sen.cmt: can also be 以下を全文修正しました。
sen.e: Materials that are layered with yosegi woodwork at the surface can also be applied to the floor wood of wooden floor.

sen.j: 小寄木の場合は傾斜させる治具を使い四角と三角の棒の木片を作る。
sen.e: In the case of koyosegi, wooden bars of rectangular and triangular cross-sections are made using a jig that can be slanted.
In the case of koyosegi, wooden bars of rectangular and triangular cross-sections are made using a jig that can be slanted.
In the case of koyosegi, wooden bars of rectangular and triangular cross-sections are made using a jig that can be slanted.

sen.j: これで木取りは終わる。
sen.e: This ends the kidori stage.
This ends the kidori stage.
This ends the kidori stage.

sen.j: 色が異なる各種の木片を複数寄せ合わせて接着剤で止め幾何学的な模様のある種板を作成する。
sen.e: Multiple pieces of various types of wood with different colors are gathered together and bonded with glue to create a seed plate with a geometric pattern.
Multiple pieces of various types of wood with different colors are gathered together and bonded with glue to create a seed plate with a geometric pattern.
Multiple pieces of various types of wood with different colors are gathered together and bonded with glue to create a seed plate with a geometric pattern.

sen.j: 麻の葉の場合は三角を３つにスジを入れて１つの三角の寄木、単位文様を作る。
sen.e: In the case of asanoha pattern, three lines are inserted into a triangle to make a triangular yosegi unit pattern.
In the case of asanoha pattern, three lines are inserted into a triangle to make a triangular yosegi unit pattern.
In the case of asanoha pattern, three lines are inserted into a triangle to make a triangular yosegi unit pattern.

sen.j: 六角にした寄木を鉋で面一（つらいち）に修正とスジを型板に入れ万力をかける。
sen.e: Yosegi pieces shaped into a hexagon are adjusted and trimmed flat at the ends, and the whole assembly is put into a template and pressure is applied using a vice.
sen.cmt: スジ 定訳不明 原文意味不明
sen.e: Yosegi pieces shaped into a hexagon are adjusted and trimmed flat at the ends, and the whole assembly is put into a template and pressure is applied using a vice.
Yosegi pieces shaped into a hexagon are adjusted and trimmed flat at the ends, and the whole assembly is put into a template and pressure is applied using a vice.

sen.j: そして最後にひし形にして終わる。
sen.e: Finally, this step ends by shaping the piece into a rhombus.
Finally, this step ends by shaping the piece into a rhombus.
Finally, this step ends by shaping the piece into a rhombus.

sen.j: 次に大寄せという工程に入る。
sen.e: Next is the oyose step.
Next is the oyose step.
Next is the oyose step.

sen.j: この大寄せでは各単位文様から大きさ、材料の良し悪しを決めていきバランスのよい小寄木にしていく。
sen.e: In the oyose step, quality of the materials is determined based on each pattern unit, and the pieces are made into koyosegi with a good balance.
In the oyose step, quality of the materials is determined based on each pattern unit, and the pieces are made into koyosegi with a good balance.
In the oyose step, quality of the materials is determined based on each pattern unit, and the pieces are made into koyosegi with a good balance.

sen.j: 種板の表面を薄く削った物をズクという。
sen.e: Surface of the seed plate that is thinly shaved is called a zuku piece.
Surface of the seed plate that is thinly shaved is called a "zuku piece."
sen.cmt: zuku piece にダブルコーテーションを追記しました。
sen.e: Surface of the seed plate that is thinly shaved is called a "zuku piece."

sen.j: ズクは木箱などの他の木製品の表面に貼り、その文様、絵柄を楽しむためのものである。
sen.e: Zuku pieces are bonded onto the surface of other woodworking products such as wooden boxes, and they are used for appreciating the pattern and the motifs.
Zuku pieces are bonded onto the surface of other woodworking products such as wooden boxes, and they are used for appreciating the pattern and the motifs.
Zuku pieces are bonded onto the surface of other woodworking products such as wooden boxes, and they are used for appreciating the pattern and the motifs.

sen.j: この技法をズク貼りという。
sen.e: This technique is called zuku bonding.
This technique is called "zuku bonding."
sen.cmt: zuku bonding にダブルコーテーションを追記しました。
sen.e: This technique is called "zuku bonding."

sen.j: 小寄木、山水、大名行列などの寄木または木象嵌に埋木を施して、湿らせたズク板を鉋で削る。
sen.e: Yosegi, such as koyosegi, sansui and daimyo gyoretsu (feudal lord's costumed procession), or another inlay work is inlaid with wood, then moistened zuku plate is shaved with a plane.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処 原文意味不明
sen.e: Yosegi, such as koyosegi, sansui and daimyo gyoretsu (feudal lord's costumed procession), or another inlay work is inlaid with wood, then moistened zuku plate is shaved with a plane.
Yosegi, such as koyosegi, sansui and daimyo gyoretsu (feudal lord's costumed procession), or another inlay work is inlaid with wood, then moistened zuku plate is shaved with a plane.

sen.j: しかし、削れ具合があるため硬木と軟木の組み合わせはできない。
sen.e: However, because of the difference in how the wood is shaved, hard wood and soft wood cannot be combined.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However, because of the difference in how the wood is shaved, hard wood and soft wood cannot be combined.
However, because of the difference in how the wood is shaved, hard wood and soft wood cannot be combined.

sen.j: 削った後は万力で重しをかけ乾燥を防ぎ、紙に裏打ちする。
sen.e: After shaving, a vice is used to apply pressure, then it is prevented from drying and then lined with paper.
After shaving, a vice is used to apply pressure, then it is prevented from drying and then lined with paper.
After shaving, a vice is used to apply pressure, then it is prevented from drying and then lined with paper.

sen.j: これでズク貼りができる。
sen.e: This is now ready for zuku bonding.
This is now ready for zuku bonding.
This is now ready for zuku bonding.

sen.j: 例えば市松の中に曲線で扇形を入れる場合は糸鋸で嵌め込む木象嵌と呼ばれる技法が使われる。
sen.e: A technique called mokuzogan inlay work is used, for example, when inserting a shape of a fan using a curved line within an ichimatsu pattern.
A technique called mokuzogan inlay work is used, for example, when inserting a shape of a fan using a curved line within an ichimatsu pattern.
A technique called mokuzogan inlay work is used, for example, when inserting a shape of a fan using a curved line within an ichimatsu pattern.

sen.j: そのほかタバコ入れなどには引き出す部分が曲線になっており木製のシャッター（スダレ）のように開き仕組まれたピアノ線から音が鳴るものもある。
sen.e: Others include cigarette cases in which the curved drawer contains a piano wires, that are designed to open like a wooden shutter, make noise.
Others include cigarette cases in which the curved drawer contains a piano wires, that are designed to open like a wooden shutter, make noise.
Others include cigarette cases in which the curved drawer contains a piano wires, that are designed to open like a wooden shutter, make noise.

sen.j: シャッター部分は木象嵌で箱のまわりはズクになっている。
sen.e: The shutter section is mokuzogan wood work and the sections around the box are made with zuku pieces.
The shutter section is mokuzogan wood work and the sections around the box are made with zuku pieces.
The shutter section is mokuzogan wood work and the sections around the box are made with zuku pieces.

sen.j: また、秘密箱とも呼ばれる、木片を引き出してスライドさせる仕掛けを組んで開けにくくした箱などが有名である。
sen.e: Also, boxes called himitsubako (secret boxes) are famous, which are boxes that are hard to open because of the sliding mechanism made with wooden pieces.
Also, boxes called "himitsubako" (secret boxes) are famous, which are boxes that are hard to open because of the sliding mechanism made with wooden pieces.
sen.cmt: himitsubako にダブルコーテーションを追記しました。
sen.e: Also, boxes called "himitsubako" (secret boxes) are famous, which are boxes that are hard to open because of the sliding mechanism made with wooden pieces.

sen.j: 最近ではハローキティ人形を寄木とろくろで作ったコラボレーションの製品もある。
sen.e: Recently, there are products, such as Hello Kitty dolls, made jointly with yosegi woodworking and a turner.
